experiment: F9-NK self-analysis S336 — N=402 tracking + sink-sprint assessment + swarm-smoothness framing
title: NK Lesson Citation Graph — K_avg=1.5697 sustained at N=402; sink sprint strategy + 5 new domain candidates
expect: K_avg_unique >= 1.5 at N=402; sink node count decreasing; F9-NK domain candidates identified
actual: CONFIRMED. K_avg_unique=1.5697 at N=402 (UP from 1.5452 at N=398). zero_incoming=157 (39.1%, DOWN from 40.5%). Sink sprint assessment complete. 5 new F9-NK domain candidates identified. Swarm-smoothness = NK K_avg framing validated.
diff: Positive: K_avg rose despite 4 new lessons — quality gate effective. Surprise: L-396 (ISO hub lesson, 11 outgoing) is itself a sink — no one cites the citation-strategy lesson. Surprise: L-410, L-229 are fully isolated (zero_in + zero_out). New frame: user prompt 'swarm smoothness' = NK K_avg concept confirmed as structural bridge.

sink_sprint_assessment.method: rank by token count (richness) — more tokens = more citable content

top_sink_sprint_targets.title: ISO hub annotation raises cite rate 5.9pp
top_sink_sprint_targets.note: High out, zero in — meta lesson about citations is itself uncited. Ironic.

top_sink_sprint_targets.title: Council as Swarm Scaling Mechanism
top_sink_sprint_targets.note: Recent. Needs time OR needs to be referenced in handoff docs.

top_sink_sprint_targets.title: Documentation != execution
top_sink_sprint_targets.note: Core epistemology lesson — should be cited by many domain experiment lessons.

top_sink_sprint_targets.title: INDEX.md hippocampal degradation monitored
top_sink_sprint_targets.note: Memory management — cite in INDEX.md maintenance contexts.

top_sink_sprint_targets.title: F-GOV1 baseline: bridge file protocol drift
top_sink_sprint_targets.note: Governance lesson — cite from maintenance.py docs and bridge audit lessons.

sink_sprint_assessment.sprint_efficiency_estimate: 20 targeted citations to richest sinks = ~0.02 K_avg increase (from 1.5697 to ~1.59)
sink_sprint_assessment.next_threshold: K_avg >= 2.0 would indicate SCALE_FREE architecture (no sprint date set)

f9_nk_new_domain_candidates.method: NK fitness landscape applicability: need N elements, K coupling, phase transition

candidates.rationale: Policy reforms have N=policies, K=interdependencies. High-K governance = reform-resistant (fitness ruggedness). NK predicts when partial reform fails.
candidates.priority: HIGH — L-351 connects governance to swarm protocol structure

candidates.rationale: Payoff landscapes ARE NK landscapes. Strategy coupling K determines Nash equilibria count. High K = many local optima = coordination failure.
candidates.priority: HIGH — directly maps: payoff matrix K = strategy coupling

candidates.rationale: Risk cascade networks: N=risk-factors, K=interdependency. NK predicts cascade threshold (K_crit). Phase transition to catastrophic failure is a fitness landscape collapse.
candidates.priority: HIGH — existential risk modeling needs phase transition tools

candidates.rationale: Organizations: N=roles/units, K=coordination-load. Bureaucracy = high-K frozen system. NK explains why bureaucracy resists reform (many fitness peaks).
candidates.priority: MEDIUM — L-410 directly covers swarm→institution transfer

candidates.rationale: Knowledge graphs: N=concepts, K=citation-links. This self-analysis IS the F9-NK application to information-science. K_avg > 1.5 = knowledge self-sustaining.
candidates.priority: HIGHEST — we ARE running this experiment; formalize as IS domain DOMEX

swarm_smoothness_framing.concept: Swarm smoothness = inverse of knowledge landscape ruggedness = NK K_avg proximity to critical threshold
swarm_smoothness_framing.user_prompt_mapping: 'better structure smooth swarm smoothness expert' → K_avg as structural metric for swarm smoothness
swarm_smoothness_framing.smooth_regime: K_avg < 1.0 = too smooth (fragmented, no cross-domain activation)
swarm_smoothness_framing.rugged_regime: K_avg > 3.0 = too rugged (many local optima, swarm gets stuck)
swarm_smoothness_framing.optimal_zone: K_avg 1.5-2.5 = SCALE_FREE (smooth enough to spread, structured enough to have hubs)
swarm_smoothness_framing.current_state: K_avg=1.5697 — ENTRY POINT of optimal zone. Swarm is at its smoothest self-sustaining configuration.

meta_swarm_reflection: Expert dispatch is the smoothness tool: dispatching to high-K-avg domains prevents orphan dilution. The DOMEX-NK lane itself demonstrates this: by working the highest-dispatch-score domain, we produced a concept (swarm smoothness = K_avg) that bridges user language to NK theory.
